name: Garlic-Butter Pizza Pull-Apart Bread
author: Nature's Own
summary: To make this crowd-pleasing Italian-inspired appetizer, simply slice a whole loaf into pull-apart sections and fill with garlic butter, mozzarella cheese, and parsley.
ingredients: 1 loaf Nature's Own® Perfectly Crafted White Bread
1 ½ cups shredded mozzarella cheese, divided
directions: Place the bread on a 12x24-inch piece of aluminum foil, taking care to keep the bread in a loaf shape
Fold the foil halfway up around the sides of the bread
With a sharp bread knife, cut the bread lengthwise in half, cutting halfway down through the bread slices
In a small bowl, combine melted butter, garlic, and Italian seasoning
Brush 2/3 of the butter mixture between the slices of bread
Sprinkle 1 cup of the mozzarella, the pepperoni, and 2 tablespoons parsley between the slices
Drizzle the remaining butter mixture over the top of the bread loaf
Place the foil-lined bread on a rimmed baking sheet
Gently cover bread with additional foil and bake for 15 minutes or until cheese is melted
Uncover and sprinkle with remaining 1/2 cup cheese
Bake for 10 to 15 minutes more or until cheese is golden and bread is just browned and crisp on the outside
Remove from oven and allow to cool slightly
If desired, sprinkle with additional parsley and serve with marinara sauce for dipping
